availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George R. Price (Metcalfe County, Kentucky, soldier)

body.p: Metcalfe County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Marie E. Price. Father of George Price. First lieutenant in the 3rd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment from October 1861 to January 1862.

bibl.p: Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Metcalfe County, Edmonton, p. 49; Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0175; "Street Duel," The Courier-Journal (Louisville Ky.), November 24, 1903, p. 8.
